description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国军事将领，中国人民解放军少将。曾任中国人民解放军军事科学院军事历史部研究员。
description.en: A military general of the People's Republic of China and a major general in the People's Liberation Army. He once served as a researcher in the Military History Department of the PLA Academy of Military Science.

description.en: Liu Guoyu is a native of Shangshui, Henan.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军军事科学院

position.en: Researcher of the Military History Department

description.zh-cn: 刘国语担任中国人民解放军军事科学院军事历史部研究员。
description.en: Liu Guoyu served as a researcher in the Military History Department of the PLA Academy of Military Science.

description.zh-cn: 刘国语被授予少将军衔。
description.en: Liu Guoyu was awarded the rank of major general.

description.zh-cn: 刘国语参加组织了《中国人民解放军战史》的编写工作。
description.en: Liu Guoyu participated in organizing the compilation of 'The History of the Chinese People's Liberation Army'.

description.zh-cn: 刘国语参加组织了《红一方面军史》的编写工作。
description.en: Liu Guoyu participated in organizing the compilation of 'The History of the First Front Army of the Red Army'.

description.zh-cn: 刘国语参加组织了《中国军事史略》的编写工作。
description.en: Liu Guoyu participated in organizing the compilation of 'A Brief History of Chinese Military Affairs'.

relationships.target: 缅怀红军伟业弘扬长征精神

description.zh-cn: 刘国语参加组织了《缅怀红军伟业弘扬长征精神》的编写工作。
description.en: Liu Guoyu participated in organizing the compilation of 'Commemorating the Great Deeds of the Red Army and Promoting the Spirit of the Long March'.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军七十年

description.zh-cn: 刘国语参加组织了《中国人民解放军七十年》的编写工作。
description.en: Liu Guoyu participated in organizing the compilation of 'Seventy Years of the Chinese People's Liberation Army'.

description.zh-cn: 刘国语参加组织了《军旗升起的地方》的编写工作。
description.en: Liu Guoyu participated in organizing the compilation of 'The Place Where the Military Flag Was Raised'.

relationships.target: 第三野战军后勤文献资料选编

description.zh-cn: 刘国语参加组织了《第三野战军后勤文献资料选编》的编写工作。
description.en: Liu Guoyu participated in organizing the compilation of 'Selected Logistical Documents of the Third Field Army'.
